info.description: A meow API server built with Go, inspired by meow
info.title: meow meow API

get.description: Returns the health status of the service using standardized response format
Returns application metrics and performance data

post.description: Resets all application metrics

get.description: Simple ping endpoint that returns pong using standardized response format

post.description: Archive or unarchive a chat (archiving automatically unpins the chat)
Set disappearing timer for messages in a chat
Download audio media from a message
Download document media from a message
Download image media from a message
Download video media from a message

get.description: Get chat history for a specific contact

post.description: Get detailed information about a specific chat (group or contact)
List all chats (groups and/or contacts) for a session
Mute or unmute a chat for a specified duration
Pin or unpin a chat to keep it at the top of the chat list
Set user presence state in a specific chat (composing, available, etc.)
Link a group to a community
Get all participants of linked groups in a community
Get all subgroups of a community
Unlink a group from a community
Get contact's profile picture/avatar
Check if phone numbers are registered on meow
Get detailed information about contacts

get.description: Get all contacts from contact's meow

post.description: Set global contact presence (available/unavailable)
Create a new meow group with specified name and participants
Get detailed information about a specific group
Get group information from an invite link without joining
post.summary: Get group info from invite link

post.description: Get group information from specific invite details
post.summary: Get group info from specific invite

parameters.description: Get group info from invite request
parameters.name: request

post.description: Get or reset the invite link for a group
Join a meow group using an invite link
Join a meow group using specific invite details
Leave a meow group

get.description: Get a list of all groups the user is a member of

post.description: Add or remove participants from a group
Get list of users requesting to join the group
Approve or reject users requesting to join the group
Set whether only admins can send messages to the group
Set disappearing messages for the group
Set whether admin approval is required to join the group
Set whether only admins can edit group info
Set who can add members to the group (all or admin only)

parameters.description: Set group member add mode request
parameters.name: request

post.description: Update the name of a group
Remove the photo/avatar of a group
Update the photo/avatar of a group
Update the topic/description of a group
Get information about a specific media file

get.description: Get a list of all media files for a session

post.description: Upload a media file to the server

delete.description: Delete a media file from the server

post.description: Compress a media file to reduce its size
Convert a media file to a different format

parameters.description: Target format (e.g., jpg, png, mp4, mp3)
parameters.name: format

get.description: Download a media file from the server
Get detailed metadata information about a media file
Get the upload progress of a media file

post.description: Delete a message for everyone or just for me
Edit the text content of a message
Mark one or more messages as read in a chat
Add or remove reaction to a message
Send an audio message to a meow contact
Send a button message to a meow contact (not yet implemented)
Send a single contact or multiple contacts to a meow contact. Supports both legacy single contact format and new multiple contacts format.

parameters.description: Contact message request (supports single or multiple contacts)
parameters.name: request

post.description: Send a document message to a meow contact
Send an image message to a meow contact
Send a list message to a meow contact (not yet implemented)
Send a location message to a meow contact
Send a media message (image, video, audio, document) to a meow contact
Send a poll message to a meow contact (not yet implemented)
Send a sticker message to a meow contact
Send a text message to a meow contact
Send a video message to a meow contact
Create a new meow newsletter

get.description: Get a list of all subscribed newsletters for a session

post.description: Upload media files (image, video, audio, document) for use in newsletter messages. Returns MediaHandle required for sending media messages.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid file or parameters

404.description: Session not found or not connected

get.description: Get information about a specific newsletter

post.description: Send a text or media message to newsletter subscribers. For media messages, MediaHandle is required.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid parameters or missing MediaHandle for media

404.description: Newsletter not found or session not connected

post.description: Subscribe to a newsletter to receive updates
Unsubscribe from a newsletter to stop receiving updates

get.description: Get the list of blocked contacts (blocklist)

post.description: Get specific privacy settings or all settings if none specified

put.description: Set multiple privacy settings in a single request

get.description: Get information about registered webhooks for a session

post.description: Set a webhook URL to receive meow events

get.description: Get list of all supported webhook event types

post.description: Creates a new meow session and starts the client

get.description: Retrieves a list of all meow sessions

post.description: Initiates connection to meow and returns QR code if needed. Accepts session ID or name.

delete.description: Deletes a meow session and stops the client

post.description: Disconnects the session from meow without deleting it

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific session by ID or name

post.description: Pairs a phone number with the session for meow connection

400.description: Invalid request body or session ID

get.description: Retrieves the current status and connection information of a session

put.description: Updates the webhook URL and events for a session

details.example: Phone number must include country code
Community JID must be in format: number@g.us
Phone number must include country code

for_everyone.description: true = delete for everyone, false = delete for me

details.example: Phone number must include country code
Phone number must include country code

audio.description: Base64 data URL or HTTP URL

document.description: Base64 data URL or HTTP URL

image.description: Base64 data URL or HTTP URL

sticker.description: Base64 data URL or HTTP URL

video.description: Base64 data URL or HTTP URL

media.description: Optional media type for composing state

details.example: Webhook URL must be a valid HTTPS URL

ApiKeyAuth.description: API Key authentication. Simply provide your API key directly: "YOUR_API_KEY". The system automatically detects if it's a Global API Key (can access all sessions and session management) or a Session-specific API Key (can only access the specific session it belongs to).
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
